TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 5
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to J. H. Bell, 01-08-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to J. H. Bell, January 8, 1828. Concerning reservation of land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 5

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to J. H. Bell, January 8, 1828. Concerning reservation of land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p*I recd your letter by *person_mentioned*Col Philips*/person_mentioned* relative to the place that was reserved to the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1828">1 of this month*/date_mentioned* for your*person_mentioned* motherinlaw—*/person_mentioned*-On the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1828">first day of this*/date_mentioned**person_mentioned* Mr. Duke*/person_mentioned* applied for the same *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*pr *person_mentioned*Mr Moore*/person_mentioned* who lives in *location_mentioned*Bay Prairie*/location_mentioned* and presented a letter from *person_mentioned*Moore */person_mentioned*on the subject—I was compeled to say that on that day all previous promises of the place were out, and that it was therefore vacant, and it was consequently entered pr *person_mentioned*Mr. Moore*/person_mentioned*—I could not do otherwise-—*/p*
*p*I expect to be at my*location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* about the *date_mentioned n="01-20-1828">20 of this month*/date_mentioned* and will call and see you, tho my stay below will be very short, not more than one day—*/p*
*p*Remember me to*person_mentioned* Mrs Bell*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-08-1828">Jany. 8. 1828*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*J. H. Bell*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
